attributes.action: stop this nonsense regarding cutting down the time it takes to train troops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and then ship them out to war zones.  This is a disgusting proposal, when these people signed up they thought they would get proper training not a quickie.  If Brown and other members of parliament are keen to get more people out to fight in Iraq and Afghanistan then let them send out their own family members and let them fight on the frontline. (After a couple of weeks training of course)

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
